pkgmetadata.longdescription: # QURI Parts QulacsQURI Parts Qulacs is a support library for using Qulacs with QURI Parts.You can combine your code written in QURI Parts with this library to execute it on Qulacs.## Documentation[QURI Parts Documentation](https://quri-parts.qunasys.com)## Installation```pip install quri-parts-qulacs```## LicenseApache License 2.0
